1.0.0.name: wordpress/santra
1.0.0.description: Santra literally means Orange in Hindi (derived from the theme’s color scheme). Santra is clean and lightweight blog centric theme suitable for any kind of WordPress sites. It is fully widgetised with the a right sidebar for pages, blog feed and single view posts as well as 3 footer widgets. Santra is built on Bootstrap and is therefore responsive and adaptive to the viewing media device.
